speaker: Agent
text: Hello, is this Mr. Thompson? This is Lisa calling from XYZ Collections.

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Mr. Thompson. What can I help you with?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance with City Bank. Can you confirm your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Mr. Thompson. You currently have a balance of $450. How would you like to settle this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I wasn't aware of that balance. Can you break down the charges for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Of course! The charges include a missed payment fee and interest. Would you prefer to pay with a card over the phone?

speaker: Customer
text: I need to review my statements before making a payment.

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. Once you have the information, feel free to call us back. We can also email you the summary of the charges if that helps.

speaker: Customer
text: That would be great, thank you.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! We appreciate your attention to this matter. Have a nice day!
